sigma.trading.news

Class NewsInstrument

  • java.lang.Object
    • sigma.trading.Instrument
      • sigma.trading.news.NewsInstrument

  • public class NewsInstrument
extends sigma.trading.Instrument
    Instrument class for News Trading. Extends general instrument.
    Version:
    0.2
    Author:
    Peeter Meos

        m_secType - Security type string

        m_expiry - Expiry date string

        delta - Delta between trigger price and last price double
        trailAmt - Trailing amount for trail order double
        target - Profit taker target double
        adjLimit - Limit when order will be moved to match the market double
